sect1.title: Filter introduction
sect1.para: Commonly in information technologies terminology one refers to a filter as a tool which will take appropriate input data, apply some algorithm possibly according to some set values to it and return the modified data. The same is true for GIMP's filters, here a filter will accept image data, modify it in some way and display the modified data in the image window in place of the former data.

The filters are divided into several categories:
Blur
Colors
Noise
Edge-Detect
Enhance
Generic
Glass Effects
Light Effects
Distorts
Artistic
Map
Render
Map
Render
Web
Logulator
Misc
Animation
Combine
